title: League installation at 0.0min/0.0Mb
body:
Well my league client was having issues with patching so i uninstall it and install a new fresh copy. The installer does everything it needs to do and then a patcher opens which is says eta 0 mins and 0.0Mb/0.0Mb. I TRY EVERYTHING and no ther is no lol.launcher for me to use.

helpp

replies.body:
I woudl recommend running a full clean install through the Hextech Repair Tool: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool

If there's any old files lying around that are causing issues, sometimes a normal uninstall won't properly clean them out (since it doesn't delete all local files) where a clean reinstall should.
